title: Catching crocodiles
creator_credit: Noel Monkman and Efftee Film Productions
brief_description: This film, showing aspects of the life of crocodile hunters on the Gulf of Carpentaria, was one of eleven short Australian educational films produced by Efftee Studios as a result of a partnership between naturalist Noel Monkman and Frank Thring Snr. Monkman photographed and directed the films and Frank Thring Snr narrated most of them. Two series were produced: the “Barrier Reef” series which consisted of five films and the “Australian Marvelogue” series, of which “Catching Crocodiles” is one of six. Suitable for secondary school level.
